Chap. 111 - Diary Entries

                                                            MS - 40 - 1891 

                             Diary--January 1891 


             Battle Creek, Mich., [Thursday], January 1, 1891 


     New Year's day opens with a soft rainstorm. Another year has commenced; 1890 has passed into eternity with its burden of record. I renew my consecration to God. Said Christ, "I sanctify myself, that they also may be sanctified." "Sanctify them through thy truth: thy word is truth." I claim the rich promises of God through the matchless love and spotless character of Jesus Christ my Advocate. I have labored almost constantly and yet I see so much that needs to be done that it makes me restless, for it seems I have done so little compared with the great work to be done.
